excerpt: This delicious Vegan Ratatouille is made with fresh vegetables and herbs and is perfect for a quick and flavorful weeknight dinner.

instructions.name: Preparation
instructions: Heat oil in a large oven-safe pan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is translucent about 5 minutes.

instructions.name: Vegetables
instructions: Add eggplant, zucchini, and yellow squash to the pan and cook for 10 minutes.
Add red bell pepper, salt, black pepper, thyme, rosemary, and oregano to the pan and cook for additional 5 minutes.

instructions.name: Baking
instructions: Pour crushed tomatoes over the vegetables and stir well.
Transfer pan to preheated oven and bake for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.

instructions.name: Serving
instructions: Remove from oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.
Serve hot with crusty bread or over rice or quinoa.
